uk.thecodingbadgers.minekart.jockey

Class Jockey

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.thecodingbadgers.minekart.jockey.Jockey

  • public class Jockey
extends Object
    Author:
    TheCodingBadgers A jockey consists of a player and his mount. A mount is any entity that can be controlled. Jockeys also hold any powerups attained during a race.
